about.description: I'm a 17 year old boy who's passionate about building websites and is in love with modern software development. I'm currently studying computer science in high school, but I'm mostly self-taught as I believe that one can learn really anything with so many available resources on the internet, these days!

work.about: And those are some of my projects!
work.extra: I have spent quite a decent amount of time working with back-end technologies like Node.js and MongoDB database. And I loooove competitive programming!

todoList.title: To-do List
todoList.description: This application lets you create your digital to-dos so you can easily keep track of the things you need to get done. It all works on the few major functions you need: creating new items, deleting items and renaming them. The simple colors and smooth animations add up to the decent user experience.

calculator.title: Calculator
calculator.description: A simple calculator with all the basic operations you can think of. It's another rookie project but I had so much fun figuring many things while building this. With this project, I learned a lot about dealing with user's input to show the intended output.

movieFight.title: Movie Fight
movieFight.description: This is one of the projects I built using a course. You can compare two movies/series and see which one does better in different stats according to the world's most popular IMDb movie database.

natours.title: Natours
natours.description: Another course project that showed me the beauty and power of CSS. I learned how to use stunning effects and basically how to make things look great!

clipboard.title: Clipboard Landing Page
clipboard.description: A website I built with nothing but given mockup designs. A great front-end exercise from Frontend Mentor.

contact.placeholderMessage: Hey, I'd like to work with you...
